title: LOCKDOWN Protocol
description: Lockdown Protocol is a first person social deduction game, combining real time action and communication , 3 to 8 players. In this game, players have to work together to collaboratively complete tasks in time. While most players will do their best to complete this objective and ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try to stop them at all costs, without getting caught. Into the Radius 2

game_info.Genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
